name: Hotshot Diablo
description: A fiery demonic gunslinger from the desert wastes of hell, wielding twin infernal pistols with deadly precision.

abilities.name: Dual Shot
abilities.description: Deals 614 damage to two random targets (can be the same). If any shot crits, 50% chance to fire again infinitely.

abilities.name: Armor Piercer
abilities.description: For 3 turns, your critical strikes permanently reduce target's armor by 2% (stacking).

passive.name: Trickshot
passive.description: Whenever you deal damage, you have 12% chance to fire a bullet that deals 100% Physical damage to a random enemy. This ignores armor.
